thread.title: Signet Jewelers Announces Timing of Fiscal 2019 First Quarter Earnings Release and Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Signet Jewelers Announces Timing of Fiscal 2019 First Quarter Earnings Release and Conference Call
text:
HAMILTON, Bermuda--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Signet Jewelers Limited (NYSE: SIG) intends to announce its first quarter results at approximately 7:00 a.m. ET on Wednesday, June 6, 2018.
On that date there will be a conference call at 8:30 a.m. ET and a simultaneous audio webcast available at www.signetjewelers.com .
The call details are:
Toll Free US Dial-in: 833-245-9657 International Dial-In: +1 647-689-4229 Confirmation Code: 5918319
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180504005021/en/
Signet Jewelers Limited
Randi Abada, +1 330-668-3489
SVP Corporate Finance Strategy & Investor Relations
randi.abada@signetjewelers.com
or
David Bouffard, +1 330-668-5369
VP Corporate Affairs

Source: Signet Jewelers Limited
